# commercetools_shipping_zone (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "commercetools_shipping_zone" "de-us" {
  name = "DE and US"
  description = "Germany and US"
  location {
      country = "DE"
  }
  location {
      country = "US"
      state = "Nevada"
  }
}
```
